text: IONIS School of Technology and Management (IONIS STM) is a French private graduate school in information technology, computer science, energy, biotechnology and management.Ionis School of Technology and Management (Ionis- STM) It was made in 2009 and is in Le Kremlin-Bicêtre.« Ionis School of Technology and Management forme des cadres managériaux et techniques » The school delivers 14 Master of Business Administration (MBA) recognized by French StateHomologation de 3 MBA pour Ionis STMLe Répertoire National des Certifications Professionnelles (RNCP) Résumé descriptif de la certification and can teach both technical and management aspects.IONIS School of Technology and Management == Bibliography == * La double compétence : l’antidote à l’obsolescence professionnelle, Ivry-sur-Seine, FYP Éditions, 2019, 192 p. (ISBN 978-2-36405-176-8) == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:2009 establishments in France
title: IONIS School of Technology and Management
